attributes.action: To enforce a new francy dress law and two day working week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The world is boring, let us all wear fancy dress to work on Mondays and choose at our disrection what other day we choose to work. Failure to wear fancy dress will result in public hanging, in a monkey costume.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
